LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedMayo.label: consumed mayo (from meal)
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedMayo.description: Mayo is a thick emulsion of egg, oil, and other herbs. Mayonnaise, while terrible for you, adds a pleasing tang and is very calorically dense. It lowers hunger rate by 15% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedAgave.label: consumed agave nectar (from meal)
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedAgave.description: Agave nectar is a thin and semi-sweet nectar, known for its healing and anti-inflammatory properties. Gives a 15% immunity gain speed boost for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSpices.label: consumed spices (from meal)
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSpices.description: Consumed a variety of aromatic and pungent spices. It increases manipulation stat by 5% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_WellFed.label: well fed (from grilled meal)
LanguageData.VCE_WellFed.description: I have eaten a delicious and filling grilled meat. It lowers hunger rate by 35% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedSimple.label: well fed (from grilled meal)
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedSimple.description: I have eaten a delicious and filling grilled meat. It lowers hunger rate by 35% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedFine.label: well fed (from grilled meal)
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedFine.description: I have eaten a delicious and filling grilled meat. It lowers hunger rate by 35% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedLavish.label: well fed (from grilled meal)
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedLavish.description: I have eaten a delicious and filling grilled meat. It lowers hunger rate by 35% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedGourmet.label: well fed (from grilled meal)
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedGourmet.description: I have eaten a delicious and filling grilled meat. It lowers hunger rate by 35% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedDigestibleResurrectorNanites: Resurrector nanites will resurrect this person as long as they are active. The effect lasts for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_SugarRush.label: consumed sugar (from meal)
LanguageData.VCE_SugarRush.description: Sugar is easily converted into energy by the body, which may result in a nice burst of energy. It increases moving stat by 15% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetMeal.label: consumed gourmet food (from meal)
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetMeal.description: This colonist consumed an incredible food.
